content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it quite convenient and comfortable. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo. The apartment is in great condition, and it's in the city center. I'm looking for a rental price of 1200 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a steep price, Yi-Nuo. I'm sure you understand that the apartment, although great, is unfurnished and only has one bedroom. I'm willing to go up to 900 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Yi-Nuo. However, the apartment is in the city center and has a great location. I can offer you a discount of 100 euros, making it 1100 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate the discount, Yi-Nuo. However, I believe the apartment is worth more than 1100 euros per month. I can offer you 950 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm trying to be reasonable here, Yi-Nuo. The location of the apartment is excellent, and it's newly built. I can offer you a final price of 1000 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for the final offer, Yi-Nuo. However, I believe the apartment is worth more. I can offer you 975 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo. Considering the location and condition of the apartment, I think 1000 euros per month is a fair price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we have reached a reasonable price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your decision, Yi-Nuo. Let's agree to the price of 1000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [1000] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
